name: Duelists
description:
This game was made for Boss Battle: A DragonRuby Game Jam by Marc, Akzidenz, xenobrain & Crub.
For best performance, please download the game using the buttons below.

Lady Smythe’s husband, the Fourth Earl of Tadbury, has disappeared in mysterious circumstances, along with their capable secretary, Mrs. Winchester. Lady Smythe traced their whereabouts to the country estate of Lord Fothergill, an irascible scoundrel with an unsavoury reputation.

Having accepted her adversary’s challenge to a deadly duel, Lady Smythe walks out to meet the nefarious nobleman on the field of honour. Shall she yet survive to see her husband and the formidable Mrs. Winchester again?

Controls Gamepad

RUN: D-PAD or LEFT STICK
POINT: RIGHT STICK
FIRE: SHOULDER BUTTONS or TRIGGERS
JUMP: D-PAD UP or A/B/X/Y BUTTONS

PAUSE: START BUTTON

Keyboard and Mouse

RUN: A/D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS
POINT: Z/X or / or MOUSE CURSOR
FIRE: SPACE or MOUSE CLICK
JUMP: W or UP ARROW KEY

PAUSE: ENTER or P

VOLUME: -/=

Team

Marc: Lead programming
Akzidenz: Graphics, programming
xenobrain: Music, SFX
Crub: Character concepts
lyniat.games: Playtesting, emotional support
levionitch: Team mascot
